name: Gunk
description:
Gunk is a 2D Platformer inspired by games and it is quite possibly the best game ever made. From the creators of absolutely nothing comes 2019s biggest hit! In this game you play as a snail in a French restaurant.

Key Features:

• Slither on walls with mind bending platforming action! You can walk upside down and on vertical surfaces in this game.

• Become the shell and taste true speed! Inspired by the shell in Mario become a pinball and bounce around to destroy objects

• Swing with the power of you sticky eyes. Everyone loves grappling hooks us included.
